name: CodeCombat - Beginner Python Programming
description: Game-based programming platform where students learn to code by playing through fantasy game levels; supports Python, JavaScript, and more.

name: CodeCombat - JavaScript Programming
description: Learn JavaScript through game-based levels; write real code to control characters; progress through increasingly challenging puzzles; build games and web applications; syntax highlighting and instant feedback; covers variables, functions, conditionals, loops, and objects.

name: CodeCombat - Advanced Computer Science Concepts
description: Advanced programming concepts through game challenges; algorithms and optimization; data structures including arrays, strings, and objects; pathfinding and AI; game development projects; competition arena for multiplayer coding battles; real-world problem solving.

name: CodeCombat - Classroom Edition
cost: Free for teachers (premium for full access)
description: Classroom integration with teacher dashboards; track student progress; assignments and assessments; curriculum alignment; professional development resources.
